actions.recommendation: -Limit your intake of alcohol and reach out to your doctor if you need support in doing so.
-Kidney function is lower than expected, please repeat the test when you are well hydrated.
-Limit foods high in saturated fats. Add a variety of fresh fruit & veggies to your meals. Limit sugary foods & drinks. Avoid organ meats & alcohol to help lower the risk of gout.

-BMI of 34.8 & waist-to-height ratio of 61% are high. This increases your risk of lifestyle diseases like diabetes & hypertension. Decrease your weight to help reduce this risk. Aim for a BMI between 18.5- 24.9 & waist-to-height ratio less than 50%.
